mapper.select: select tu.userId, tu.state, tu.userDescription, tu.userDelflag, tu.currentTime, tu.optId, tr.roleName, tr.roleId, tu.userName, tu.password from t_erp_user tu left join t_erp_role tr on tu.roleId = tr.roleId where userName=#{userName} and password=MD5(#{password}) and tu.userDelflag=0 and tr.roleDelflag=0
select count(0) from t_erp_user where userName = #{userName}
select t_erp_user.* from t_erp_user where userId = #{userId}
mapper.update: update t_erp_user set userDescription= #{userDescription}, roleId=#{roleId}, password=#{password} where userId = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_erp_user (state, userDescription, userDelflag, currentTime, optId, roleId, userName, password) values (0, #{userDescription}, 0, #{currentTime}, #{optId}, #{roleId}, #{userName}, #{password} )
mapper.update: update t_erp_user set userDelflag= 1 where userId = #{userId}
